CIPHER.9.cipherString: As long as you don't object to making educated guesses, you can even have a fun time working ciphers
CIPHER.9.question: You don't get a hint here, this is just your basic Aristocrat.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: to be very clear, it is difficult to justify making a quick choice between different letters of a cipher
CIPHER.8.question: Solve this Aristocrat which has been encoded using a K1 alphabet.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: If you act for self-gain then no good can come of it. If you act selflessly, then you act well for all and you must not be afraid.
CIPHER.10.question: Decrypt this quote from Rand Miller which has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: According to Google, This year, the three most popular halloween costumes are It, a Witch and Spider-Man.
CIPHER.11.question: The following quote has been encoded with the Vigenère Cipher using a keyword of SPOOK.  What does it say?

CIPHER.14.cipherString: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.
CIPHER.14.question: The following quote by Steve Maraboli has been encoded with the Vigenère Cipher using a keyword of LURKS.  Please decode it.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Never fire a laser at a mirror.
CIPHER.12.question: Encode this sage advice from Larry Niven using the Affine Cipher with a=7 and b=6.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: ¿Alguna vez te preguntaste si la persona en el espejo es real, y tú eres solo un reflejo de ellos?
CIPHER.15.question: Solve this Spanish Xenocrypt which is a translation of a common question that has been encoded using a K1 alphabet.
CIPHER.15.translation: Did you ever wonder if the person in the mirror is real, and you're just a reflection of them?

CIPHER.16.cipherString: If we all did the things we are really capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
CIPHER.16.question: A quote from Thomas A. Edison has been recovered from the grooves in a wax cylinder.  They appear to have been encoded using the Baconian cipher.  What does it say?

CIPHER.17.cipherString: I like flaws. I think they make things interesting.
CIPHER.17.question: A quote by Sarah Dessen has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3=××, 2=●●, 4=●×, 7=––, 9=×–, 8=–×
